title: Implement Responsive Dashboard Grid Layout
description:
Create the responsive dashboard grid layout that adapts between mobile and desktop views.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. Grid adjusts column count based on screen size (mobile: 2-4 cols, desktop: 8-12 cols)
2. Widget sizes scale appropriately across breakpoints
3. Touch-friendly widget sizing on mobile devices
4. Maintains widget proportions and readability
5. Smooth transitions between layout breakpoints
6. Proper overflow handling for long widget content
7. Integration with existing layout calculations from dashboard-widget-store.ts
